        public void scan(android.content.Context context)
        See Also:
        scan(Context, boolean)

      • scan

        public void scan(android.content.Context context,
                 boolean filter)
        Scan the media table for available media to play, filtering by the current directory if specified, and create a file tree out of the output.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        filter - Whether the media files that are found should be filtered by comparing the media path with the current directory.
